scripts.prod: rimraf temp && mkdir temp && spago bundle-app --to temp/index.prod.js && java -jar ./closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js temp/index.prod.js --js_output_file temp/index.prod.minified.js && cp index.prod.html temp && parcel build --public-url ./ temp/index.prod.html && mv dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && rimraf temp
